context: Mid-size technology company (500 employees) facing talent shortage in software engineering, requesting increased recruitment budget for Q4 2024

request.purpose: Expanded recruitment campaign targeting software engineers and data scientists
request.justification: Critical skill gaps impacting product development timelines, competitor hiring pressure

decision_process.outcome: Approved for review by executive committee
Approved with KPIs and quarterly reviews

business_impact.expected_outcome: Fill 15 critical engineering positions within 90 days
business_impact.projected_value: $2.1M in additional revenue from accelerated product development

outcome_tracking.6_month_review: 12 positions filled, budget utilization at 85%, positive candidate quality feedback
outcome_tracking.12_month_review: 15 positions filled, 20% productivity increase in engineering teams, ROI achieved ahead of schedule

lessons_learned: Early engagement with executive sponsors improved approval speed, performance-based KPIs ensured accountability, market intelligence critical for budget justification
